headline: Northern Trust Appoints Michael Darby as Northern California Market Leader
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, September 30, 2025--Northern Trust Wealth Management has appointed Michael Darby as Senior Managing Director of the Northern California Market. Darby will oversee Northern Trust’s three regional locations—Menlo Park, Mill Valley and San Francisco—and lead an integrated team that delivers investment management, trust and estate planning, private and business banking and financial consulting for clients.
